nested_items.name: errors
nested_items.description: Error information for findings that details could not be returned for.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The error code.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message.

nested_items.name: findingArn
nested_items.description: The finding ARN that returned an error.

nested_items.name: findingDetails
nested_items.description: A finding's vulnerability details.

nested_items.name: action
nested_items.description: The remediation action recommended by CISA for this vulnerability.

nested_items.name: dateAdded
nested_items.description: The date and time CISA added this vulnerability to their catalogue.

nested_items.name: dateDue
nested_items.description: The date and time CISA expects a fix to have been provided vulnerability.

nested_items.name: cwes
nested_items.description: The Common Weakness Enumerations (CWEs) associated with the vulnerability.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: epssScore
nested_items.description: The Exploit Prediction Scoring System (EPSS) score of the vulnerability.

nested_items.name: evidences
nested_items.description: Information on the evidence of the vulnerability.

nested_items.name: evidenceDetail
nested_items.description: The evidence details.

nested_items.name: evidenceRule
nested_items.description: The evidence rule.

nested_items.name: severity
nested_items.description: The evidence severity.

nested_items.name: exploitObserved
nested_items.description: Contains information on when this exploit was observed.

nested_items.name: firstSeen
nested_items.description: The date an time when the exploit was first seen.

nested_items.name: lastSeen
nested_items.description: The date an time when the exploit was last seen.

nested_items.name: findingArn
nested_items.description: The finding ARN that the vulnerability details are associated with.

nested_items.name: referenceUrls
nested_items.description: The reference URLs for the vulnerability data.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: riskScore
nested_items.description: The risk score of the vulnerability.

nested_items.name: tools
nested_items.description: The known malware tools or kits that can exploit the vulnerability.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ttps
nested_items.description: The MITRE adversary tactics, techniques, or procedures (TTPs) associated with the vulnerability.
(string) ---
